code: import*as ArtistApiUtil from"../util/artist_util";export var RECEIVE_ARTIST="RECEIVE_ARTIST";export var RECEIVE_ARTISTS="RECEIVE_ARTISTS";var receiveArtist=function receiveArtist(artist){return{type:RECEIVE_ARTIST,artist:artist};};var receiveArtists=function receiveArtists(artists){return{type:RECEIVE_ARTISTS,artists:artists};};export var fetchArtist=function fetchArtist(id){return function(dispatch){return ArtistApiUtil.fetchArtist(id).then(function(artist){dispatch(receiveArtist(artist));});};};export var fetchArtists=function fetchArtists(){return function(dispatch){return ArtistApiUtil.fetchArtists().then(function(artists){dispatch(receiveArtists(artists));});};};export var searchArtists=function searchArtists(search){return function(dispatch){return ArtistApiUtil.searchArtists(search).then(function(artists){dispatch(receiveArtists(artists));});};};
